news.title: OBR head's resignation leaves potential landmines for Reeves
news.summary: Chancellor's next mission to find a respected and credible economist to run the OBR will require careful balance

news.title: The Papers: 'OBR chief resigns' and 'Reeves clings on'
news.summary: The exit of the Office of Budget Responsibility chair follows continued attention on the chancellor.

news.title: Emotional Donaldson defeats Allen in UK shock
news.summary: World number 52 Scott Donaldson gains one of the best victories of his career as he beats eighth seed Mark Allen in a late-night finish on day three of the UK Championship.
